title: RAK10700 WisBlock GNSS Tracker for LoRaWAN > RAK10700 WisBlock GNSS Tracker for LoRaWAN > Product Description > RAK10700 WisBlock GNSS Tracker for LoRaWAN Overview
content: The **RAK10700 WisBlock GNSS Tracker for LoRaWAN** is an LPWAN Tracker device with a GNSS modem. It is built with the WisBlock modules providing LPWAN and BLE communication using the nRF52 MCU and SX1262 LoRa transceiver of the RAK4631 Core module. It includes the RAK12500 GNSS location module with the u-blox ZOE-M8Q chip, the RAK1906 environment sensor with the Bosch BME680 sensor, and the RAK1904 with an ST LIS3DH 3-axis acceleration sensor
parent_content:
The **RAK10700 WisBlock GNSS Tracker for LoRaWAN** is an LPWAN Tracker device with a GNSS modem. It is built with the WisBlock modules providing LPWAN and BLE communication using the nRF52 MCU and SX1262 LoRa transceiver of the RAK4631 Core module. It includes the RAK12500 GNSS location module with the u-blox ZOE-M8Q chip, the RAK1906 environment sensor with the Bosch BME680 sensor, and the RAK1904 with an ST LIS3DH 3-axis acceleration sensor  
It is a feature-packed tracker device for featured applications development. This device can be used as a quick prototyping tool for Internet-of-Things (IoT) and LoRaWAN Integration. The LPWAN Tracker is perfect for IoT applications such as asset tracking, smart vehicle management, and location-based services.

It includes the RAK12500 GNSS location module with the u-blox ZOE-M8Q chip, the RAK1906 environment sensor with the Bosch BME680 sensor, and the RAK1904 with an ST LIS3DH 3-axis acceleration sensor  
It is a feature-packed tracker device for featured applications development. This device can be used as a quick prototyping tool for Internet-of-Things (IoT) and LoRaWAN Integration. The LPWAN Tracker is perfect for IoT applications such as asset tracking, smart vehicle management, and location-based services.
